overview.en: CRUST provides a decentralized storage network of Web3 ecosystem. It supports multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and exposes storage interfaces to application layer. Crust's technical stack is also capable of supporting a decentralized computing layer. It is designed to build a decentralized cloud ecosystem that values data privacy and ownership. CRU18 is the locked token of CRU.
overview.zh: Crust 提供了 Web3 生态系统的去中心化存储网络，支持包括 IPFS 在内的多种存储层协议，并对应用层提供接口。Crust 的技术栈还能够支持去中心化计算层。Crust 旨在构建一个重视数据隐私和所有权的分散式云生态系统。CRU18会Crust主网上线后18个月内线性释放。
